articles.title: Italian Prime Minister Georgia Meloni commends Jannik Sinner for historic Australian Open 2024 title win - Sportskeeda
articles.description: Jannik Sinner met with Italian Prime Minister Giorgia Meloni following his 2024 Australian Open triumph.
articles.content:
Jannik Sinner met with Italian Prime Minister Giorgia Meloni following his 2024 Australian Open triumph.
Sinner emerged victorious after a three-hour and 44-minute clash against Russian star Daniil … [+2081 chars]
